domain.name: Machine Learning
domain.synthesis: A comprehensive exploration of machine learning fundamentals covering supervised learning, deep learning, data preprocessing, model evaluation, hyperparameter tuning, and deployment considerations.

categories.name: Learning Paradigms
categories.synthesis: Overview of different learning paradigms such as supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.

concepts.name: Supervised Learning
concepts.synthesis: Training models on labeled data for prediction and classification tasks.

subconcepts.name: Common Algorithms
subconcepts.synthesis: Algorithms like linear regression, logistic regression, and SVMs used in supervised learning.

details.name: Linear Regression
details.synthesis: Predicting continuous outcomes through linear relationships.

details.name: Logistic Regression
details.synthesis: Classification algorithm for binary target variables.

concepts.name: Deep Learning
concepts.synthesis: Neural network-based approaches for complex data types.

details.name: Image Classification
details.synthesis: Using CNNs to classify images into predefined categories.

details.name: Language Modeling
details.synthesis: Predicting next word in a sequence based on previous words.

categories.name: Data Preparation & Evaluation
categories.synthesis: Essential steps from preprocessing to evaluating machine learning models.

concepts.name: Data Preprocessing
concepts.synthesis: Handling missing values, scaling features, and encoding categorical variables.

subconcepts.name: Missing Value Handling
subconcepts.synthesis: Techniques to deal with incomplete datasets.

details.name: Imputation Methods
details.synthesis: Replacing missing values with statistical measures.

subconcepts.name: Feature Scaling
subconcepts.synthesis: Normalizing or standardizing numerical input features.

details.name: Standardization
details.synthesis: Adjusting data to have zero mean and unit variance.

concepts.name: Model Evaluation Metrics
concepts.synthesis: Metrics to assess model performance and generalization ability.

subconcepts.name: Accuracy Measures
subconcepts.synthesis: Quantifying correct predictions out of total predictions.

details.name: Precision
details.synthesis: The proportion of true positives among positive predictions.

subconcepts.name: Cross Validation
subconcepts.synthesis: Technique to evaluate model performance on unseen data.

details.name: k-Fold Cross Validation
details.synthesis: Dividing dataset into k subsets for repeated testing.
